name: Ignite (itch) (RadioMan, brkyldrn, SleepSoul)
description:
IGNITE your flame and fuel it with those who crave your dwindling light,
absorbing their spirits into your blade of living soul-flame.
Will you bathe in the souls of lesser beings, or be EXTINGUISHED?!

\\\|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||///

The game has been updated after the voting period was over. Bug fixes and overall gameplay polish were done. Have Fun!

Control Wisp and her sword with W A S D
Survive as long as possible, growing your sword for an even greater score,
just don't let your final lantern go out.
don't fret, however,
there are sure to be Lantern Bugs with light to spare.

\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///|||\\\|||///

Made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace Jam #20
